name: Show hovered link address at bottom-left
description:
In Firefox 4.0beta， when you hover over the link, the url address is showed on the url bar.
With this style,  it can show hovered link address in bottom-left of the current window. 

Maybe you like another version here , Show hovered link address at bottom-left Like  IE9:  http://userstyles.org/styles/40101
